00083 #define CFE_SB_POLL                     0      
00084 #define CFE_SB_PEND_FOREVER            -1      
00085 #define CFE_SB_SUB_ENTRIES_PER_PKT      20     
00086 #define CFE_SB_SUBSCRIPTION             0      
00087 #define CFE_SB_UNSUBSCRIPTION           1      
00089 /*
00090 ** Macro Definitions
00091 */
00092 #define CFE_BIT(x)   (1 << (x))               
00093 #define CFE_SET(i,x) ((i) |= CFE_BIT(x))      
00094 #define CFE_CLR(i,x) ((i) &= ~CFE_BIT(x))     
00095 #define CFE_TST(i,x) (((i) & CFE_BIT(x)) != 0)
